column5: It's finally here and we are happy to share our Beach House with you.   Our beach retreat is a few blocks from the Seawall for easy breezy beach days! Conveniently located by the Pleasure Pier, Convention Center, wonderful restaurants and night life.  The famous STRAND offers some of the best shopping the island has to offer.  Plan a day at Schlitterbahn WaterPark and the famed Moody Gardens.   Newly renovated with all the amenities of home.  We love our place and we know that you will too!
